speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: SCENE IV. Country near Milford-Haven.

speaker: BELARIUS
text_entry: Enter PISANIO and IMOGEN

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Thou told'st me, when we came from horse, the place

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Was near at hand: ne'er long'd my mother so

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: To see me first, as I have now. Pisanio! man!

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Where is Posthumus? What is in thy mind,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: That makes thee stare thus? Wherefore breaks that sigh

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: From the inward of thee? One, but painted thus,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Would be interpreted a thing perplex'd

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Beyond self-explication: put thyself

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Into a havior of less fear, ere wildness

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Vanquish my staider senses. What's the matter?

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Why tender'st thou that paper to me, with

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: A look untender? If't be summer news,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Smile to't before; if winterly, thou need'st

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: But keep that countenance still. My husband's hand!

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: That drug-damn'd Italy hath out-craftied him,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: And he's at some hard point. Speak, man: thy tongue

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: May take off some extremity, which to read

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Would be even mortal to me.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Please you, read;

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: And you shall find me, wretched man, a thing

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: The most disdain'd of fortune.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: [Reads]  'Thy mistress, Pisanio, hath played the

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: strumpet in my bed; the testimonies whereof lie

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: bleeding in me. I speak not out of weak surmises,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: but from proof as strong as my grief and as certain

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: as I expect my revenge. That part thou, Pisanio,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: must act for me, if thy faith be not tainted with

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: the breach of hers. Let thine own hands take away

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: her life: I shall give thee opportunity at

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Milford-Haven. She hath my letter for the purpose

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: where, if thou fear to strike and to make me certain

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: it is done, thou art the pandar to her dishonour and

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: equally to me disloyal.'

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: What shall I need to draw my sword? the paper

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Hath cut her throat already. No, 'tis slander,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Whose edge is sharper than the sword, whose tongue

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Outvenoms all the worms of Nile, whose breath

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Rides on the posting winds and doth belie

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: All corners of the world: kings, queens and states,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Maids, matrons, nay, the secrets of the grave

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: This viperous slander enters. What cheer, madam?

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: False to his bed! What is it to be false?

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: To lie in watch there and to think on him?

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: To weep 'twixt clock and clock? if sleep

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: charge nature,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: To break it with a fearful dream of him

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: And cry myself awake? that's false to's bed, is it?

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Alas, good lady!

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: I false! Thy conscience witness: Iachimo,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Thou didst accuse him of incontinency;

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Thou then look'dst like a villain; now methinks

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Thy favour's good enough. Some jay of Italy

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Whose mother was her painting, hath betray'd him:

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Poor I am stale, a garment out of fashion;

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: And, for I am richer than to hang by the walls,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: I must be ripp'd:--to pieces with me!--O,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Men's vows are women's traitors! All good seeming,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: By thy revolt, O husband, shall be thought

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Put on for villany; not born where't grows,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: But worn a bait for ladies.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Good madam, hear me.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: True honest men being heard, like false Aeneas,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Were in his time thought false, and Sinon's weeping

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Did scandal many a holy tear, took pity

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: From most true wretchedness: so thou, Posthumus,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Wilt lay the leaven on all proper men;

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Goodly and gallant shall be false and perjured

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: From thy great fall. Come, fellow, be thou honest:

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Do thou thy master's bidding: when thou see'st him,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: A little witness my obedience: look!

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: I draw the sword myself: take it, and hit

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: The innocent mansion of my love, my heart;

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Fear not; 'tis empty of all things but grief;

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Thy master is not there, who was indeed

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: The riches of it: do his bidding; strike

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Thou mayst be valiant in a better cause;

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: But now thou seem'st a coward.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Hence, vile instrument!

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Thou shalt not damn my hand.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Why, I must die;

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: And if I do not by thy hand, thou art

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: No servant of thy master's. Against self-slaughter

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: There is a prohibition so divine

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: That cravens my weak hand. Come, here's my heart.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Something's afore't. Soft, soft! we'll no defence;

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Obedient as the scabbard. What is here?

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: The scriptures of the loyal Leonatus,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: All turn'd to heresy? Away, away,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Corrupters of my faith! you shall no more

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Be stomachers to my heart. Thus may poor fools

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Believe false teachers: though those that

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: are betray'd

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Do feel the treason sharply, yet the traitor

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Stands in worse case of woe.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: And thou, Posthumus, thou that didst set up

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: My disobedience 'gainst the king my father

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: And make me put into contempt the suits

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Of princely fellows, shalt hereafter find

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: It is no act of common passage, but

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: A strain of rareness: and I grieve myself

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: To think, when thou shalt be disedged by her

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: That now thou tirest on, how thy memory

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Will then be pang'd by me. Prithee, dispatch:

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: The lamb entreats the butcher: where's thy knife?

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Thou art too slow to do thy master's bidding,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: When I desire it too.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: O gracious lady,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Since I received command to do this business

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: I have not slept one wink.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Do't, and to bed then.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: I'll wake mine eye-balls blind first.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Wherefore then

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Didst undertake it? Why hast thou abused

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: So many miles with a pretence? this place?

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Mine action and thine own? our horses' labour?

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: The time inviting thee? the perturb'd court,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: For my being absent? whereunto I never

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Purpose return. Why hast thou gone so far,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: To be unbent when thou hast ta'en thy stand,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: The elected deer before thee?

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: But to win time

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: To lose so bad employment; in the which

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: I have consider'd of a course. Good lady,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Hear me with patience.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Talk thy tongue weary; speak

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: I have heard I am a strumpet; and mine ear

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Therein false struck, can take no greater wound,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Nor tent to bottom that. But speak.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Then, madam,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: I thought you would not back again.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Most like;

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Bringing me here to kill me.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Not so, neither:

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: But if I were as wise as honest, then

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: My purpose would prove well. It cannot be

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: But that my master is abused:

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Some villain, ay, and singular in his art.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Hath done you both this cursed injury.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Some Roman courtezan.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: No, on my life.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: I'll give but notice you are dead and send him

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Some bloody sign of it; for 'tis commanded

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: I should do so: you shall be miss'd at court,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: And that will well confirm it.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Why good fellow,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: What shall I do the where? where bide? how live?

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Or in my life what comfort, when I am

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Dead to my husband?

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: If you'll back to the court--

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: No court, no father; nor no more ado

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: With that harsh, noble, simple nothing,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: That Cloten, whose love-suit hath been to me

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: As fearful as a siege.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: If not at court,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Then not in Britain must you bide.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Where then

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Hath Britain all the sun that shines? Day, night,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Are they not but in Britain? I' the world's volume

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Our Britain seems as of it, but not in 't;

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: In a great pool a swan's nest: prithee, think

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: There's livers out of Britain.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: I am most glad

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: You think of other place. The ambassador,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Lucius the Roman, comes to Milford-Haven

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: To-morrow: now, if you could wear a mind

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Dark as your fortune is, and but disguise

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: That which, to appear itself, must not yet be

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: But by self-danger, you should tread a course

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Pretty and full of view; yea, haply, near

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: The residence of Posthumus; so nigh at least

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: That though his actions were not visible, yet

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Report should render him hourly to your ear

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: As truly as he moves.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: O, for such means!

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Though peril to my modesty, not death on't,

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: I would adventure.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Well, then, here's the point:

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: You must forget to be a woman; change

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Command into obedience: fear and niceness--

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: The handmaids of all women, or, more truly,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Woman its pretty self--into a waggish courage:

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Ready in gibes, quick-answer'd, saucy and

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: As quarrelous as the weasel; nay, you must

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Forget that rarest treasure of your cheek,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Exposing it--but, O, the harder heart!

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Alack, no remedy!--to the greedy touch

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Of common-kissing Titan, and forget

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Your laboursome and dainty trims, wherein

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: You made great Juno angry.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Nay, be brief

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: I see into thy end, and am almost

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: A man already.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: First, make yourself but like one.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Fore-thinking this, I have already fit--

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: 'Tis in my cloak-bag--doublet, hat, hose, all

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: That answer to them: would you in their serving,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: And with what imitation you can borrow

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: From youth of such a season, 'fore noble Lucius

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Present yourself, desire his service, tell him

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: wherein you're happy,--which you'll make him know,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: If that his head have ear in music,--doubtless

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: With joy he will embrace you, for he's honourable

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: And doubling that, most holy. Your means abroad,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: You have me, rich; and I will never fail

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Beginning nor supplyment.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Thou art all the comfort

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: The gods will diet me with. Prithee, away:

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: There's more to be consider'd; but we'll even

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: All that good time will give us: this attempt

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: I am soldier to, and will abide it with

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: A prince's courage. Away, I prithee.

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Well, madam, we must take a short farewell,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Lest, being miss'd, I be suspected of

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Your carriage from the court. My noble mistress,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Here is a box; I had it from the queen:

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: What's in't is precious; if you are sick at sea,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Or stomach-qualm'd at land, a dram of this

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Will drive away distemper. To some shade,

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: And fit you to your manhood. May the gods

speaker: PISANIO
text_entry: Direct you to the best!

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Amen: I thank thee.

speaker: IMOGEN
text_entry: Exeunt, severally
